title: WTT My T206 Shag Hindu for either Thornton/Scoops/Foster with a hindu back
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTT My T206 Shag Hindu for either Thornton/Scoops/Foster with a hindu back
posts.post_content:
Id like to trade my T206 Shag Hindu back (PSA 1) for a Scoops, or Thornton, or Foster with a Hindu back.

Id be happy to offer cash along with my shag if your card is in better condition than PSA 1

I copy and pasted the back of the card just to the right of the front below.
